about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Tiernan! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Tiernan if you don't already own him! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Tiernan (if you don't already own them)
  • His Resplendent Changeling Golden Epic Butterfly
  • His Rare Fruiting Silver Bough and Rare Tartan Wrap gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials
detailed_description:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Tiernan! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Tiernan if you don't already own him! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Tiernan (if you don't already own them)
  • His Resplendent Changeling Golden Epic Butterfly
  • His Rare Fruiting Silver Bough and Rare Tartan Wrap gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
